author: Staff Reporter
text:
The city municipal corporation will be spending Rs. 4, 55,990 for presenting the budget on February 28.

This includes, Rs. 2.70 lakh for printing 250 copies of 100-page booklet on the budget, Rs. 87,000 for 200 bags, Rs. 7,200 for 200 pens, Rs. 9,000 for 200 note pads and Rs. 45,000 for printing 200 copies of action taken report. Also, the corporation would be spending Rs. 37,700 for decorating the council meeting hall for the budget presentation. Officials said that the expenses would be incurred from the general fund of the corporation.
title: Corporation to spend Rs. 4.5 lakh for budget presentation
